modelIdentification.name: NATO Education and Training Network (NETN) Multi-Resolution Modelling (MRM) Module
modelIdentification.purpose: The purpose of NETN-MRM is to support federations where models are represented at multiple levels of resolution and where the level of resolution can change dynamically during a simulation.
modelIdentification.description: The MRM FOM module specifies interaction classes necessary to enable federation multi-resolution modeling.
modelIdentification.useLimitation: NETN-MRM covers the following cases: * Aggregation of subunits and/or physical entities * Disaggregation of unit into subunits and/or physical entities * Division of simulated unit into specific parts - resources divided and all entities simulated * Merge of previously divided parts with simulated unit. * Activate and Inactivate aggregate units' representation in the simulation
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.1.1 - Initial version of NETN-MRM FOM Module released as part of NETN-FOM v2.0.
v2.0.0 - Updated version by MSG-163 to be part of NETN-FOM v3.0.

poc.pocName: MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation
MSG-134 NATO Distributed Simulation Architecture & Design, Compliance Testing and Certification
MSG-106 Enhanced CAX Architecture, Desing and Methodology

interactionClass.name: MRM_Interaction
interactionClass.semantics: Base class for all MRM interactions.

parameter.name: EventId
parameter.semantics: Unique identifier for all MRM interactions belonging to the same request/respons event.

interactionClass.name: Request
interactionClass.semantics: A base class for all MRM Request events.

parameter.name: Federate
parameter.semantics: Required: Intended federate responsible for performing the requested action. Sending federate should ensure that receiving federate has the capability to perform requested action. If not able to perform, a response interaction indicating failure should be returned.

parameter.name: AggregateEntity
parameter.semantics: Required for all requests except QuerySupportedCapabilities: Unique identifier for the AggregatedEntity for which this request is related to.

interactionClass.name: Aggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to the AggregateFederate to perform aggregation of the specified AggregateUnit's parts.

parameter.name: RemoveSubunits
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicates if the disaggregate subunits (represented as aggregates in the federation) should be deleted from the federation execution. Default is TRUE - all subunits should be deleted. If FALSE all disaggregate subunits shall be set to inactive.

interactionClass.name: Disaggregate
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to perform a full disaggregation of a AggregatedUnit. All subunits and platforms will be registered in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Divide
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to divide the simulated AggregateUnit into multiple simulated object. The resouces are divided among the simulated entities. After successful division two simulated entities represent the entire Unit. 1) The original AggregateUnit and 2) the divided unit or platform. Both these entities are simulated until merged.

parameter.name: Equipment
parameter.semantics: Required: A set of unique identifiers of subelements of the AggregateUnit. These can be any subunit and/or equipment defined at a subunit on any level.

interactionClass.name: Merge
interactionClass.semantics: Instruction to merg the simulated AggregateUnit with the selected divided parts. After successful merge the divided parts are removed from the federation and their resources are combined with the AggregatedUnit.

parameter.name: Parts
parameter.semantics: Required: A set of unique identifiers of subelements of the AggregateUnit. These can be any subunit and/or equipment defined at a subunit on any level.

interactionClass.name: QuerySupportedCapabilities
interactionClass.semantics: A request to query the capabilities of a specified federation to provide support for MRM events. The queried federate shall respond with a CapabilitiesSupported interaction.

interactionClass.name: Activate
interactionClass.semantics: Request federate to change of status of AggregateUnit to Active. If required the unit will be registered in the federation.

interactionClass.name: Inactivate
interactionClass.semantics: Request change of status of AggregateUnit to Inactive and if indicated remove it from the federation.

parameter.name: Remove
parameter.semantics: Optional: Indicates if the Aggregate Unit shall be removed as an object instance in the federation. Default = FALSE - keep object instance in federation.

interactionClass.name: Response
interactionClass.semantics: A response from the receiving federate indicating ability to comply with request.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.semantics: Required: Specifies the result of the request action. TRUE indicates success.

interactionClass.name: CapabilitiesSupported
interactionClass.semantics: An interaction sent in respons to a QuerySupportedCapabilities request. The respons include a list of names of the supported capabilities for the Aggregate unit specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".

parameter.name: CapabilityNames
parameter.semantics: Required: A list of names of the supported capabilities for the Aggregate entity specified in the query. The names are one or more of "Aggregate", "Disaggregate", "Divide", "Merge", "Activate" and "Inactivate".
